duty: start motors and engage machinery, such as sprayer agitators or pumps or portable spray equipment.

duty: provide driving instructions to truck drivers to ensure complete coverage of designated areas, using hand and horn signals.

duty: establish the location for a fence, and gather information needed to ensure that there are no electric cables or water lines in the area.
title: Fence Erectors

title: Fence Erectors

title: Fence Erectors

duty: assemble gates, and fasten gates into position, using hand tools.

title: Fence Erectors

duty: nail top and bottom rails to fence posts, or insert them in slots on posts.

duty: discuss fencing needs with customers, and estimate and quote prices.
title: Fence Erectors

duty: stretch wire, wire mesh, or chain link fencing between posts, and attach fencing to frames.

duty: blast rock formations and rocky areas with dynamite to facilitate posthole digging.

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: co-pilot aircraft or perform captain's duties, as required.

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: use instrumentation to pilot aircraft when visibility is poor.
title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: check baggage or cargo to ensure that it has been loaded correctly.
title: Commercial Pilots

duty: obtain and review data such as load weights, fuel supplies, weather conditions, and flight schedules to determine flight plans and identify needed changes.

title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: supervise other crew members.
title: Commercial Pilots

duty: request changes in altitudes or routes as circumstances dictate.
title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: rescue and evacuate injured persons.

title: Commercial Pilots

duty: plan and formulate flight activities and test schedules and prepare flight evaluation reports.
title: Commercial Pilots

title: Commercial Pilots
